wa. 1865 di kolambaa maha nagara sabhawa sansthapanaya kirima sandaha sar harkiyulas robinsan wisin wyawasthadayaka sabhawa wetha panathak idiripath karana ladi.warsha 1865 nowambar masa 25 dina prasiddha karana lada niwedanayakin kolambaa nagaraye nagarika simawan niwedanaya kerunu athara 1865 desambar 08 dina, nagarika manthriwarun lesa idiripathwimata sudusukam laba athi gruha mulikayange lekhanayak piliyela kirima sandaha kamitu raswimak kachcheriye di pawathwuni.kamituwa wisin piliyela karana lada layisthu pariksha kara balimata ha awashya sanshodhanayan sandaha eki layisthu, pura dina 14k kachcheriye pradarshanaya karanu labiya.
